title: The Addams Family 2
description: The Addams get tangled up in more wacky adventures and find themselves involved in hilarious run-ins with all sorts of unsuspecting characters.

reviews.text: All over the place, not many laughs for the kids. Boring, sellout of the name.
There are many hidden jokes and gestures but it's hard for kids to spot the out and pick their interest and attention. It was boring to watch for me as an adult and for the kids as well.
bad[ bad ]adjective, worse, worst;(Slang) bad·der, bad·dest for 36.not good in any manner or degree.
I want to kill myself, but that wouldn’t matter in the world of the Addams Family.
all over the place. this movie was disrespectful to the original show. kids barely laughed. trash.
Spooky and fun. Just as The Addams Family was intended. The spooky bits somehow were probably the funniest to me.
La primera fue fatal, absurda y mala, esta secuela es mil veces peor con diferencia.
La verdad no la he visto, pero siempre trato de buscar opiniones de películas antes de verla, y creo que ésta está pésima
I love Addams's family. I am a big fan of Morticia. I liked a story that travels around the United States. They visited San Antonio. It looked like they enjoyed our cowboy legacies! Great movie!

The sequel to THE ADDAMS FAMILY failed to pique my interest? Some of the film's scenes were entertaining, while others were strange? It's not something I'd recommend to anyone else! The film was so disjointed that it appeared as if the creative team was racing to the finish line. Every scene was sloppily cut; I was looking forward to seeing this film and had ignored all of the negative reviews, but I had to leave after the first 30 minutes. As a result of all of the confusing scenes, my head began to ache. The music was fantastic!. In my opinion, it isn't any "better" than the first. It isn't as interesting or entertaining as the first film. Wednesday was far too prevalent, with far too little of everything else. They try, but the majority of the humour is repetitive and lacks originality. It was all very bland and boring. Because of the voice cast and the characters that are well-known and popular, it's not even worth watching for those reasons alone. This franchise's prospects and future are completely meaningless. In terms of visual effects or the evolution of the animated film genre into a more artistic medium, The Addams Family 2 is not a ground-breaking animated comedy sequel by any means.
